definition: Miluo river in Jiangxi and Hunan provinces, flows into Dongting lake
name of a river, the southern tributary of Miluo river 汨羅江|汨罗江[Mi4 luo2 jiang1]
gauze/to collect/to gather/to catch/to sift
surname Luo
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang

sentences.english: In real life the Miluo River in what look like ?
sentences.chinese: 现实生活中的汨罗江是什么样子容貌？

sentences.english: Miluo River famous, mainly because of the relationship between Qu Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 汨罗江的出名，主要是因屈原的关系。

sentences.english: In people's imagination, poetry is the Miluo River in the Holy Land home.
sentences.chinese: 在人们的想象中，汨罗江是诗家的圣地。

sentences.english: Miluo River in the east of Dongting Lake, the Dongting Lake water system.
sentences.chinese: 汨罗江在洞庭湖东侧，属洞庭湖水系。

sentences.english: Turn round, the facing north of Mi-Luo River walks.
sentences.chinese: 转身，向着汨罗江北走去。

definition: Qu Yuan (340-278 BC), famous Warring States statesman and poet, author of Sorrow at Parting 離騷|离骚 Lisao in Songs of Chu 楚辭|楚辞
name of a river, the southern tributary of Miluo river 汨羅江|汨罗江[Mi4 luo2 jiang1]

Dongting Lake in northeast Hunan province
